messages.message:
Hi all!

Here is a wiki page detailing how anyone with a good idea for improving OCR can easily *test* and *quantify* that improvement.

https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/MI/pages/74022932/How+to+Test+Quantify+OCR+Improvements

Ideally, folks with clever ideas can get straight to them with minimal effort finding datasets, writing evaluation harnesses, etc. The good news is for OCR we are well on our way! We have:

• A dataset of >500 ID card images AND golden OCR results
• A series of Jupyter notebooks to act as test harnesses
• Already-written evaluation functions
I hope this page is a help -- please pitch in with edits / improvements / requests!

Thanks to @Mohit for the OCR experiments that motivated the creation of this resource!
